adm:managed-object.name: openidm-account-status-notification-handler
adm:managed-object.adm:synopsis:
The
is an account status notification handler that post a message to OpenIDM whenever an account status notification is generated for password reset or changes.

adm:property.name: asynchronous
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Indicates whether the notification should be send asynchronously to OpenIDM.
adm:property.adm:description: When notifications are synchronous, the messages will be recorded and replay in case of failure.

adm:property.name: log-file
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the log file location where the changed passwords are written when the plug-in cannot contact OpenIDM.
adm:property.adm:description: The default location is the logs directory of the server instance, using the file name "pwsync". Passwords in this file will be encrypted.

adm:pattern.adm:synopsis: A path to an existing file that is readable by the server.

adm:property.name: attribute-type
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the attribute types that this plug-in will send along with the password change.
adm:property.adm:description: Zero or more attribute type can be specified.

adm:alias.adm:synopsis: If no attribute types are specified, only the DN and the new password of the user will be synchronized to OpenIDM.
